body: At 2nd level, an arctic druid gains a bonus on Initiative checks and Knowledge (geography), Perception, Stealth, and Survival checks equal to 1/2 her druid level in cold or icy terrain, and she cannot be tracked in cold or icy terrain. This ability replaces woodland stride.
name: Arctic Native
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/Core Classes/Druid/Druid Archetypes/Arctic Druid/Arctic Native
